__e: After so long, why are you still following me?
She comes up and says, "Max, why are you following me?"
Why do you always follow me when I do something wrong?
If we're not out in five minutes, you follow us in.
The law says you will stay with us for another year then you will go into his house.
She comes up and says, "Max, why are you following me?"
You follow me to Mum's and now this.
You said you'd follow me to the ends of the Earth.
You've caused so much trouble. Don't follow me again. If you follow,
